data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Sud-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sud-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sud-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next hour in Sud-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Sud-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Sud-Kivu unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord we pray you unite the 751,419 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Sud-Kivu.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Sud-Kivu who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, may the churches in Sud-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.focus_label: Sud-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo
